meanings.definition: A dish of Italian origin consisting of a flat, round base of dough baked with a topping of tomato sauce and cheese.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat pizza with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The pizza at that restaurant is always delicious.
meanings.sent3: When the pizza delivery guy arrived, he did a little dance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a warm slice of pizza on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked pizza filled the room.

meanings.sent1: Can I have another pizza, please?
meanings.sent2: She grabbed a pizza and headed to the couch to watch TV.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to steal a slice of pizza from the table.
meanings.sent4: His eyes lit up when he saw the last pizza slice.
meanings.sent5: The gooey cheese on the pizza stretched as she took a bite.
